definition: of or relating to or characteristic of Bosnia-Herzegovina or the people of Bosnia, a person from Bosnia or of Bosnian descent
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or characteristic of Bosnia-Herzegovina or the people of Bosnia
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of Bosnia-Herzegovina or the people of Bosnia
noun
- a person from Bosnia or of Bosnian descent
= example: a person from Bosnia or of Bosnian descent
- the variety of Serbo-Croatian spoken by the Bosnian people
= example: the variety of Serbo-Croatian spoken by the Bosnian people
